meanings.definition: Capable of being attributed or ascribed to a particular cause or source.
meanings.sent1: The increase in sales was directly attributable to the new marketing strategy.
meanings.sent2: The success of the project was attributable to the hard work of the team.
meanings.sent3: It was funny how the messy room was attributable to the playful puppy.
meanings.sent4: Her infectious laughter was attributable to a bubbling spring of joy within her.
meanings.sent5: The mysterious disappearance of the cookies was attributable to the mischievous cat.
